channel.title: My server is off on mopar status page (Once again) Please help!
channel.description:
Well... my server was on, asnd then i guess i came back from the store and it said it was offline on the status page on mopar. Any reason why? 1. Im portforwarded perfectly 2. My ip is changed and is in client and everything. 3. Its online in other server status pages.
Pelase help and think of ideas. NOTE: people are connecting but it says its offline on mopar, the other sites i have it on, its online on them.

item.title: My server is off on mopar status page (Once again) Please help!

@mr_extremez wrote:

Make a new page?

item.title: My server is off on mopar status page (Once again) Please help!

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

maybe its mopars server? it doesn’t realize its uptime so it still says its offline?

Read full topic

item.title: My server is off on mopar status page (Once again) Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Cr34m Ic3 Cr34m
item.description:
@Ic3_Cr34m wrote:

itai:

Your IP changes, if you port-forwarded you will have to change IP in the settings.

Sorry im editing the post, i meant it says its offline on the status page, but its actually online in total, cause people are connecting. so its just mopar.

Read full topic
